attributes.action: Remove/Lower the alcohol limit for Drink Driving, to zero.  The only limit should be ZERO mg/l in the bloodstream
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be absolutely no tolerance of drink driving.  Anyone caught driving with the smallest amount of alcohol in their blood should be charged with drink driving.
This is the only way to ensure that: 
a: Drivers aren't caught out because they thought they were "within the limit"
b:  A clean cut and black and white law for everyone to easily follow.  No grey areas - drink alcohol and drive and you are breaking the law.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/no-drink-driving/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
